body_html: Don't forget that you can deploy and reference native binaries. As an example see Netty's native capability. Which would mean a super easy way of consuming TensorFlow from JVM languages with minimal setup - awesome!
body_text: Don't forget that you can deploy and reference native binaries. As an example see Netty's native capability. Which would mean a super easy way of consuming TensorFlow from JVM languages with minimal setup - awesome!
body: Don't forget that you can deploy and reference native binaries. As an example see [Netty's native capability](http://netty.io/wiki/forked-tomcat-native.html). Which would mean a super easy way of consuming TensorFlow from JVM languages with minimal setup - awesome!
